website_summaries.verdict: Pet your dog and groom him at the same time with this 2-sided glove: one side removes loose hair and the other picks hair off your furniture.
pros: Not suited to thick or coarse coats, but good for pets w/thin, short, or delicate fur, including cats
Excellent for sensitive areas: face, chest, legs
cons: Won't penetrate mats, tangles, or very thick fur

customer_reviews.title: May not work for all cats
customer_reviews.text: My two cats will barely tolerate this grooming tool. The bristles need to be softer and shorter for short-haired cats. Every glove on the market seems to be made of the same material, which appears to be designed for long-haired dogs. We need a cat-only design made with very soft, short plastic bristles! Otherwise, it works as advertised. 4 stars rather than 5 because advertisements should say "some cats" rather than just "cats".
customer_reviews.author: wizard_chef

customer_reviews.title: My cats wait in line to be brushed with this glove!
customer_reviews.text: This is highly effective, but you have to brush deep and hard and it takes about 10-12 strokes before you will see hair coming off the cat. Keep it up. My cats can go a long time -- longer than my arm can hold out. Doing this once every week or every second week is really effective.
customer_reviews.author: K. Trebesch

customer_reviews.title: Great for my rescue who is afraid of brushes
customer_reviews.text: My beautiful rescue cat is a Maine Coon (long haired ragdoll). Due to mistreatment when she was small, she is afraid of brushes. Her fur would get so matted, I would bring her to the vet so they could sedate her for grooming and cut her undercoat. We did this every 6 weeks ($140-) each time. This was not healthy for her or my wallet. I was seeking a better way. This brush, so far is working. If I move slowly with it she's ok. It is gently and her coat is in much better shape. We are very pleased- this product is the answer.
customer_reviews.author: micheled

customer_reviews.title: Great for furniture
customer_reviews.text: I love this. I don’t use it on my dog...he hated it and I don’t think it worked that well..but it’s fabulous on furniture, clothes, blankets etc. I even use it on the rug for those areas the vacuum can’t get like just under the edges of the bed or heater. Fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin G

customer_reviews.title: Works great even on short haired cats
customer_reviews.text: My cat doesn't mind me petting him with this glove at all. I was amazed at how much fur I got off him even though he is short haired.
customer_reviews.author: taylorville

customer_reviews.title: Where is the hair?
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves to be petted with this however there is never any hair in it or on it, just loose hair flying around the house through the sunbeams streaming through the window. Quite disappointing. Only for those who enjoy a dog hair shower.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Best thing for Cat hair
customer_reviews.text: I've tried lots of things to get rid of the cat hair on my quilt and furniture but this thing is the best item I've ever purchased. So easy to use and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Elly Kaufman

customer_reviews.title: Purchased this because my cat hates everything else
customer_reviews.text: I thought I'd give this a go. Turns out my cat will tolerate the glove, and it works really well. Her coat looked sleeker immediately, and she's not even a long-haired cat.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Good product, but I wish it was ambidextrous
customer_reviews.text: I am left-handed, but this glove is made to be used on your right hand. For the price, I wish they had put the combs on the front and the back so that it would be ambidextrous.
customer_reviews.author: Christina B.

customer_reviews.title: Great glove for brushing
customer_reviews.text: This glove is a lifesaver. I love the silicone side. The hair really does stick to it, then peel the hair off and discard. The other side doesn't really pick up hair from my couch or clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: 2-in-1 Pet Glove: Grooming Tool + Furniture Pet Hair Remover Mitt - for Cats & Dogs -
customer_reviews.text: This is a great grooming glove, but it does not collect the dog hair on the brush as stated! I purchase a different one as well, kinda disappointing for both.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Forgan

customer_reviews.title: Bristle comes off
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this product a few years ago, probably used it a couple of times since I use the furminator more often. I just used it again today and the bristles on the gloves came off. Don't know if its because the rubber is dry but beware that this thing does not last
customer_reviews.author: Yang

customer_reviews.title: Best for fabric hair removal
customer_reviews.text: The best for removing hair from any fabric. I ordered my first one a few years ago and it finally started breaking down after repeated washings. Didn't hesitate to reorder.
customer_reviews.author: Cary NC

customer_reviews.title: May be better for long fur dogs?
customer_reviews.text: I had a rottweiler and brushing his fur with this glove did work but I feel like I wasn't getting as much loose fur as I thought it would? It was easy to clean. The fur that collected on the brush was easy to lift off.
customer_reviews.author: buttercup

customer_reviews.title: Does not hold the dog hair
customer_reviews.text: Did not grap or hold hair. Ok as a brush but not if you intend to use on a dog that sheds and expect to pick up the hair.
customer_reviews.author: edna

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: Does not work as stated. I have both a long haired dog and cat and does not really pick up the hair from them.
customer_reviews.author: Biker

customer_reviews.title: Our cat loves the glove
customer_reviews.text: It is amazing how much fur can come off in one brushing! Our cat loves being massaged with the glove.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary

customer_reviews.title: Does the job well
customer_reviews.text: We got this to clean the dog and cat hair off of our couch. Works better than a vacuum or lint roller. Can only swipe in one direction to pick up the hair, if you swipe the other direction it will lose all the hair it has already picked up. Overall we really liked this product and both our pets like the grooming side of the glove as well. Would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Shaunte

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Too small for my hand. Thumb is way to short. And the nubs hardly remove any hair from my short haired cats.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Covel

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This is great if your cat is feisty. they think you're just petting them. Works well.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Half good
customer_reviews.text: The plastic rubber nobs suck, however the other side works better at fur removal on furniture and rugs, if you find the right direction to move.
customer_reviews.author: Mictaste

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: Works good. My cat can't stand it for long. But she doesn't like being brushed anyways. Works good on furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work at all.
customer_reviews.text: This glove doesn't do a thing, unless you put too much pressure on the poor kitty.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Daniel Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: This product did not work. It didn’t remove any hair. The plastic nail heads are to short. It was a total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Gmv

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put on, stays on while using, and easy to remove. Cleans up easily and the dog loves getting brushed.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Butler

customer_reviews.title: Great for pet hair on furniture
customer_reviews.text: To be honest, my cats don’t love this but they’re not the type that like to be pet anyways. But the soft side of the glove works great for pet hair on furniture. It literally takes it right off. Way better than rollers.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Good enough
customer_reviews.text: Use it on a lab Does a decent job. Not as good as wet finger going through hair though😁
customer_reviews.author: Sigrid Webb

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed with design or function
customer_reviews.text: This product did not remove dog hair like advertised. The glove seems oversized and does not remove much loose hair.
customer_reviews.author: MSblueMagnolia

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: It's big for my hand, and my dog just tries to eat it when I use it on him.
customer_reviews.author: danika

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty useless as it falls off your hand. You can’t get the hair out of the palm and you can only use it on one direction to try to clean the hair from furniture
customer_reviews.author: Julie M

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter's bunny loves this glove and she loves being brushed with it. Very good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Geegaw

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty well on cats and dogs
customer_reviews.text: It didn't pickup as much hair in several passes on my cat as I thought it would. Works very well on the dog.
customer_reviews.author: COtt

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. We have 2 dogs that shed a lot and we use this all the time to quickly clean off the couch. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Knouse

customer_reviews.title: Cats enjoy the glove
customer_reviews.text: My cats seem to enjoy being brushed with the glove
customer_reviews.author: Leakey387

customer_reviews.title: Buy the dollar store one.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this glove over a year and have rarely used it. It is just as convient to use a brush or my hands to groom my dogs. Sadly, after I purchased it I found the exact same product for $1 at the dollar store.
customer_reviews.author: BreeAnne

customer_reviews.title: Cat is so scared of this
customer_reviews.text: This is probably a great item but my cat is terrified of it. I can’t even touch him with it, he bolts when he sees it. Bonus kitty pic!
customer_reviews.author: JessyG

customer_reviews.title: Cats love it, and I recommend  it.
customer_reviews.text: My cats enjoy it very much. Fits either hand. And it is easy to use. It's holding up well also.
customer_reviews.author: Dollymop22

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This product works, it's hard to keep on the hand so I kind of grip it inside which bunches it up a bit. But both sides work for what they advertise they do.
customer_reviews.author: dana

customer_reviews.title: Hair removal side works well. Pet grooming side not for time hair.
customer_reviews.text: It picks up the hair of surfaces well. However, the cat grooming side won’t grab much of the cats hair cause the teeth are widely spaced and the cats hair is too fine. Mitt is a bit large for the woman’s hand.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn of Sandman Metals

customer_reviews.title: Great for cleaning!
customer_reviews.text: Love this for cleaning fur off my couch. Not so great for grooming my golden retriever.
customer_reviews.author: Ihateshopping02

customer_reviews.title: It's easy to use my cat loves it and gets all the loose fur
customer_reviews.text: It's easy to use my cat loves it and it does a good job
customer_reviews.author: john schembri

customer_reviews.title: The cats love the Blue Hand
customer_reviews.text: Even the cat that did not like the brushing , come and asks to be de-haired
customer_reviews.author: Threefeathers

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My nephew love this glove and so does the dog.
customer_reviews.author: Colette

customer_reviews.title: Great for cleaning furniture
customer_reviews.text: One size does not fit all. This mitt is quite awkward. The side for cleaning fur off of fabric does work really well.
customer_reviews.author: E. Mackenzie

customer_reviews.title: Tightness of Velcro on glove
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this glove going through her hair. Only complaint is the Velcro around my wrist cannot get tight enough for it to stay on me.
customer_reviews.author: Bones

customer_reviews.title: Rubber nubs started coming off around 2 years
customer_reviews.text: The rubber little numbs started coming off at around 2 years and we are now finally throwing it away. They became less tacky and started getting them all over the place.
customer_reviews.author: Josh B

customer_reviews.title: Works and they like it !
customer_reviews.text: Like the product and more important both my dog and my cat love to be groomed
customer_reviews.author: Prof

customer_reviews.title: It traps the hair in the mitten really well
customer_reviews.text: I have a pit bull and very short haired mix breed who shed like crazy! I bought a few other brushes and they were ok, but this mitten is amazing! Really gets all the loose hairs off of them and they love it! Would HIGHLY recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS
customer_reviews.text: REALLY LIKED THIS PRODUCT. I HAVE 3 CATS AND THEY LIVE IN MY ROOM SO THERE IS HAIR EVERYWHERE. I USED IT AND IT DID CLEAR AWAY THE HAIR THAT I WAS WANTING TO CLEAR AWAY. IT WAS ALSO EASY TO CLEAN HAIR OFF OF GLOVE
customer_reviews.author: LESLIE A BASEY

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Takes and cleans up a lot of loose hair. Good for dogs who have long & short coats.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: YOUR PETS WILL LOVE IT, AND YOU WILL LOVE IT EVEN MORE!!!
customer_reviews.text: I gave it as a gift and I keep getting thank yous for it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Wooldridge

customer_reviews.title: Works wonders for the laundry
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing, it picks up all hair and once you have enough on the mit it’s very easy to clean off !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not work as described
customer_reviews.text: My cat doesn’t like it, me neither cuz it does not pick up any hair from my cat nor the chair. It’s hard to clean the glove too.
customer_reviews.author: Lluvy

customer_reviews.title: Not for everyone
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t work well with short haired dog hair like a French Bulldog
customer_reviews.author: Joey Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t work on either of my long or short straight hair dogs. Nor did the lint part pick up the hat from couch or clothes. Sent it back
customer_reviews.author: Marlena Vincent

customer_reviews.title: The best ever!
customer_reviews.text: I have two cats and a hound dog. This mitt has been the best thing ever for de-furring my pets especially during seasonal shedding cycles. Plus, it takes the fur right off my furniture. Double win! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: JENN HINCKLEY

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Replaced an old one, the rubber nubbies pick up hair the brush left behind
customer_reviews.author: jeff w

customer_reviews.title: removes hair easily from furniture
customer_reviews.text: It removes hair from our cats and from furniture and clothing, great product. It works much better than others I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: laura

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: My cats love this. Go bananas. They won’t let me brush them with anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: IT works Well
customer_reviews.text: It got really deep under coat hair that my old pet brush left behind. A Lot of hair I didn't realize needed to be shed.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha2354

customer_reviews.title: It's not hard bristles but it needs to be!
customer_reviews.text: It was not hard bristles and it does not remove any dog hair what so ever.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Great price and value
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried several different brushes for my puppy. None of them seem to work as good as this.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Collins

customer_reviews.title: Very practical to use
customer_reviews.text: My cats love brushing with these gloves. Helps remove cat hair from couches, upholstery, etc
customer_reviews.author: Prath

customer_reviews.title: Dont bye it
customer_reviews.text: My cat and it does not work on furniture like you say
customer_reviews.author: Linda Barton

customer_reviews.title: Useful for cleaning cat tree and furniture
customer_reviews.text: Useful for cleaning my cat’s tree and furniture but not quite useful for grooming my cat.
customer_reviews.author: Shruti

customer_reviews.title: looks like a great idea but my dog didn’t like it and neither did I
customer_reviews.text: Please do not waste your time purchasing this item it looks like a great idea but my dog didn’t like it and neither did I
customer_reviews.author: Brian Gale

customer_reviews.title: Not as easy as ad says
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't get hair off dogs as easy as shown. Did work in the sofa but would have liked it to work better. Ok product.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Did not work on my lab/hound/pit mix or my pug.
customer_reviews.author: A.J.

customer_reviews.title: Great - indoors
customer_reviews.text: Got this glove, and it worked great - both sides did their jobs, on dog and sofa alike! But we used it outside and left it there - because that was where we brushed the dogs off, and within a week or so the sun had destroyed the rubber, which then all snapped off. DO NOT use or leave outside!
customer_reviews.author: mr h hamilton

customer_reviews.title: needs to be redesign
customer_reviews.text: the inside of the rubber of the glove needs to take in the whole glove not just part of it . It is to small and the hair sticks too the side of the glove and even a vacuum cleaner won't get all the hair off the glove not worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: This works really well on my cat and medium hair dog. Its easy to clean, too.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: This mitt works wonders on pet hair.
customer_reviews.text: Works so nice to get the back tufts off the dog. Also just rub it along the furniture and the hair disappears. Great idea for a hair catcher.
customer_reviews.author: Robin N.

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves it and that’s all that matters
customer_reviews.text: She wags her tail when she sees it. Enough said.
customer_reviews.author: patricia gilroy

product_meta.title: 2-in-1 Pet Glove: Grooming Tool + Furniture Pet Hair Remover Mitt - for Cats & Dogs - Long & Short Fur - Gentle Deshedding Brush - Your Pet Will Love It
product_meta.description:
LOVE YOUR PET BUT NOT THE SHEDDING? 

We have great solution to your hairy problems! 

Try our “Pat Your Pet” Grooming Glove and completely forget about shedding like an awful nightmare. Get rid of hairballs before they appear once and for all! 

Our high quality Grooming Glove was designed to be extremely gentle with your pet bringing only satisfaction and pleasure. Grooming has never felt so good! From now this will be a long-awaited reward for your little furry friend associated with an extra attention and closeness. 

You will achieve great grooming results while just petting and stroking your pet. No more stressful chasing trying to comb out your pet. Don’t worry, using our Glove you’ll still have more than enough fur for a pair of handmade socks just by the next Christmas. Of course if you’re good at knitting! 

Does your furry friend prefer your couch rather than his bedding? Relax! From now you have an extra bonus - Glove’s upper velour side collecting hair from furniture, carpets and fabrics. Yes, we mean it, everything is just so easy! One Glove - clean house, happy pet and happy you. 

Order right now and when you do, consider getting two and get a free shipping... one for you and one for a friend as a gift. 

Have only the best moments with your furry friend and enjoy your clean house!
feature_bullets: Forget about shedding - Our Glove easily removes loose pet hair and tangles so no fur goes flying
Remove hair from furniture - Glove's velour side effectively cleans fur from furniture & carpets
Pets love glove - Rubber tips provide gentle relaxing massage. Petting is better than pet chasing
For short, medium & long coat - Extra gentle for daily grooming. Perfect for sensitive & young pets
Make your grooming routine easy - With this glove you'll keep your pet attractive and home hair-free
